history.content:
For someone with an interest in data science and machine learning, but mostly in an applied way and not for future research track, I'm wondering if someone can suggest courses. I'm considering taking some subset of  CS100 (Data 100), IEOR 135 (Data X Applied Data Science with Venture Applications), CS 188 (AI), CS182 (Neural Networks( and CS 189 (Machine Learning). 

IEOR 135 in particular looks like it works with a lot of interesting technologies in a more applied way, but I wonder if it it would be useful to take another data science course first to get some foundations in and make better use of it as a project based course.
history.subject: data science courses in eecs and other departments

history.content:

IEOR 135 in particular looks like it works with a lot of interesting technologies in a more applied way, but I wonder if it it would be useful to take another data science course first to get some foundations in and make better use of it as a project based course.
